projectsExplorer.description: List subfolders from one or more root directories and open them like workspaces.
projectsExplorer.viewContainer.title: Projects
projectsExplorer.view.title: Projects
projectsExplorer.command.openProjectInNe: Projects: Open Project in New Window
projectsExplorer.configuration.title: Project Explorer
projectsExplorer.configuration.rootPaths: List of absolute folder paths whose direct subfolders are shown as projects. In the settings UI you can use “Add Item” to add more paths.
projectsExplorer.configuration.requireGi: Only show folders that contain a `.git` directory.
projectsExplorer.configuration.ignore.de: List of folder names that should be ignored.
projectsExplorer.configuration.openInNew: If true, a left click opens the project in a new VS Code window.
